endpoint_metadata.title: Avathon APM API
endpoint_metadata.description: Returns datasource's values given a date range.

query_parameters.name: startDate
query_parameters.description: Start time of the query in Unix Timestamp format.

query_parameters.name: endDate
query_parameters.description: End time of the query in Unix Timestamp format

query_parameters.name: aggregationType
query_parameters.description: Operation to apply for the grouping. Sum without zeros = 0, Average = 1, Maximum = 6, Minimum = 7, Count = 9, Sum with zeros = 11

query_parameters.name: grouping
query_parameters.description: minute hour day week month quarter year

query_parameters.name: elementId
query_parameters.description: Element Id if element level aggregation is needed. Plant level aggregation is returned if not passed.

query_parameters.name: page
query_parameters.description: The page of results to retrieve.
